attributes.action: Allow non NHS fully vaccinated people to enter in UK without doing quarantine!!
attributes.additional_details:
I would like the government to change immediately this new travel restriction for non NHS fully vaccinated people travel from UK from amber countries. 
Its quite discriminatory for the other people who made the vaccine in other country then UK
Also British citizens are allowed to travel with NHS vaccine in many countries in Europe and not only,without do quarantine so I believe its fair British government consider this and change it ASAP.
Thank you.
attributes.background:
British government to change immediately the new travel  restrictions for non fully vaccinated people travel in UK from amber countries. 
In the end its the same vaccine and this restriction has no sense or logic.....

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/592505
